mapper.insert: insert into manager(loginName, password, name) values(#{loginName}, #{password}, #{name})
mapper.select: select id, loginName, password, name, superAdmin from manager where id = #{id}
select id, loginName, password, name, superAdmin from manager where loginName = #{loginName}
mapper.update: update manager set superAdmin = -1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count(id) from manager where superAdmin != -1
select id, loginName, name, superAdmin from manager where superAdmin != -1 order by id limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}
